Reviews.Title: Charging battery issue
Reviews.Author: kathy kalish
Reviews.Content: Phone is okay.  Very small compared to my old phone.  The major thing is the seller included a note that if you let the battery run down completely on this model that the charger will not work.  You then need an external charger, which we had to order within the first week.  It is inconvenient to make sure you watch so the battery stays charged.  Other than that not a bad phone, especially if you want a basic phone to avoid data charge of $30 a month from verizon.  Verizon sure is pushing everyone to use a smart phone.

Reviews.Title: poor quality
Reviews.Author: T. Aman
Reviews.Content: Looks like a touch screen, but its not. Very cheaply made. Do not like they way you have to move your finger over the "ok" button to scroll down.  Major problems with charging both in home and in the car.  Would not purchase this brand phone again.

Reviews.Title: Why Buy A Contract?
Reviews.Author: DJ All Star
Reviews.Content: Just got my Jest from Amazon. What a great deal! The phone is priced right. It does exactly what it needs to do. Makes calls, sends txts & doesn't take up too much pocket space. Best of all, no need for another 2 year contract with Verizon. Great buy!

Reviews.Title: More problems than can be imagined
Reviews.Author: pnkgtrs
Reviews.Content: Initially the Jest seem just a bit clunky.  It's touch navigation system could be a lot easier to navigate.  However, when combined with: the difficulties to text on that tiny keyboard, the fact that the speaker function produces an echo that distracts whomever you're talking to, the phone's low memory capacity which forces you to delete text and voice messages constantly, AND THEN the battery dying on me after less than 2 weeks.  This phone was horrible.

Reviews.Title: Pantech Jest
Reviews.Author: stephani S.
Reviews.Content: Great price and the phone works great! I love the full keyboard. Definitely a good buy. I have been using this product for awhile now and have had no issues.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: Steve R. Garskof "S. Ramon"
Reviews.Content: Great to keep in your front pocket, or, your James Bond secret compartment.  Buttons are a little hard to find, but, they work fine.  Good batt life, etc..............

Reviews.Title: Good phone looked like new.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Tony Whitaker"
Reviews.Content: This phone is nice, but my son doesnt care for it as he says there are too many girls around school that have it. It does take some getting used to in order to navigate the menus. Thereare some really good youtube videos out there to help though.

Reviews.Title: Its ok but wish i would have paid more for a "NEW" phone
Reviews.Author: Sj
Reviews.Content: The phone is a great phone. But my screen was all scratched and ugly looking. I wish i would have paid the extra 5 dollars for a new one.

Reviews.Title: Good Message/Text phone
Reviews.Author: Gary Knotts
Reviews.Content: I down graded from a Blackberry Bold to the Jest for a better rate plan. this phone does what i need it to do, I have had no problems with the battery ( per other reviews) because i fully charged the battery before use. the optical touch pad did not present a problem because blackberry uses a similar technology, it just takes a little time to properly manipulate it. the mobile email has issues but thats the fault of Verizon, not the phone. MMS works very well as does text. call quality is decent but the speaker phone feature is great, loud and clear. mobile web worked as expected and picture/video fits with a phone in this category.Not a smart phone but a decent (to me) Message/Text phone.

Reviews.Title: dumb phone
Reviews.Author: Robert Williams
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for a family member to help them out, first verizion stated that "nope we can activate that phone, it was a prepaid"so I worked thru that problem, and now the phone wont stay on unless its plugged into the charger. this is an aggravatingsituation.

Reviews.Title: Terrible phone … never worked
Reviews.Author: James McBride
Reviews.Content: The phone never worked from the moment it was pulled from the box. Phone was new. Dial pad keys  operated poorly, making it impossible to enter numbers. With some difficulty, I got it going and working, but eventually it quit because it simply didn't work after you plugged it in and charged the battery. The phone would not work when it was unplugged from the wall. Bought it as a Christmas present in early November, and could not return it as the return period expired.

Reviews.Title: nice phone
Reviews.Author: Yankee Faulkner
Reviews.Content: I got this phone for my husband when he wanted something to text with. The features ate easy to use and as he has no experience with any phone that is smart this transition has not been to bad. It scratches so I had to get a case, and screen cover. he can answer it, text and take a picture. The battery life on this phone is amazing. We live in a spotty Cell area, the search sleeps not looking for service and killing the battery, have to love that.

Reviews.Title: LIke flushing $35 down the toilet
Reviews.Content: Don't waste your time or money. The phone stopped working unless it was plugged into the wall almost immediately..and conveniently stopped working completely JUST after the window for returns had expired. Such a bummer.

Reviews.Title: Piece of junk!
Reviews.Author: Linda Romano
Reviews.Content: this phone lasted exactly 36 days, 6 days past the allowable return date! It only works now if attached to the charger, then dies immediately after unplugging, not very useful for a cell phone. Do not buy one of these!!!!

Reviews.Title: Terrible  Phone! BUYER BEWARE!
Reviews.Author: Angie M. Margrave
Reviews.Content: Terrible phone! Battery will not stay charged. The "OK" button in the middle is supposed to be used in order to navigate the screen, but it is so terribly sensitive, that it is impossible to navigate!

Reviews.Title: It didn't work.
Reviews.Author: Cheyenne
Reviews.Content: The phone didn't even work. Oh, I take that back, it made it almost three days before I couldn't unplug it or it'd die. Now the battery doesn't even hold a charge.

Reviews.Title: just don't
Reviews.Author: Brittany
Reviews.Content: i wouldnt recommend this phone to anybody. I ordered it and by the second day it would only work if it was plugged in.

Reviews.Title: Good kid phone
Reviews.Author: FRASER
Reviews.Content: Nice texting phone for my tween.  Very hard to find a phone without a data package these days. It's cute, functional, and seems to have a nice battery life.

Reviews.Title: Activated and working flawlessly so far....
Reviews.Author: K. E. Bowden
Reviews.Content: I just got the phone today... so this is not a full review. I'll come back in a few weeks and do that. This review is mainly so I can confirm for other potential buyers that this is a viable option. I was nervous about buying this phone. I didn't want the hassle of returning it if I couldn't actually get it to work on my Verizon account.  Those worries turned out to be unnecessary. I got the phone out of the box, took the back off, jotted down the serial numbers and put the battery in. Then I went to the Verizon website and signed in. There was a little confusion about which of the three serial numbers they actually wanted. I popped up the Verizon instant chat thingee and we got the right serial number in the right box and they walked me through the rest of it, which wasn't much, really. I dialed *228 and followed the instructions.I have now entered my contacts and sent a practice text and phone call to my Mom. So far so good. I'll be back in a few weeks after I have played with it and write a full review. I am looking forward to putting in a memory card and loading some music on it and seeing what that is like. My expectations are not super high in that regard, so if it does what it is supposed to, I'll be very satisfied. more on that later.

Reviews.Title: Perfect phone!
Reviews.Author: Emilie
Reviews.Content: This phone has been the best phone I've ever had.  It is small but not too small and still big enough to where the keyboard isn't too small to type with.  It has clear photo quality and it has very fast messaging.  I love it.
